sentences.english: To draw up the training programs.

sentences.english: Drafting a system for the accreditation of the continuing education of the librarians.
sentences.chinese: 研拟图书馆员继续教育的认可制度。

sentences.english: Analyzed data from a survey on diversity and developed a recommended plan.
sentences.chinese: 经由一个差异调查资料并研拟出一份推荐计画。

sentences.english: We have to develop a proactive action plan against Terrorist Threat.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须研拟一个前摄的性的行动计画对抗恐怖攻击。

sentences.english: The object of this study is to develop a vehicle maintenance plan for the would-be constructed Tainan LRT system.
sentences.chinese: 本论文主要为研拟台南轻轨运输系统之车辆维修计画。
